ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Shop, Earn, Celebrate: Flybuys Unplugged | Retail Insights with AWS

ns2:group.ns2:title: Shop, Earn, Celebrate: Flybuys Unplugged | Retail Insights with AWS
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Full episode: https://youtu.be/TcrwBJoPLj0
Join us for a captivating conversation with Anna Lee, CEO of Flybuys, Australiaâ€™s leading coalition loyalty program, as we uncover how Flybuys is revolutionizing customer experience through data-driven innovation and personalized engagement.
In this episode, hosts Lucy Moffat (Head of Cross Industry, ANZ) and Isha Dalal (Enterprise Solutions Architect) take you behind the scenes of Flybuysâ€™ journey, showcasing how everyday shopping is being transformed into truly rewarding experiences for millions across Australia. Discover how Flybuys has grown from a classic loyalty program to a vibrant part of daily life, creating moments of delight and connecting people to their favourite retail partners.
Discover how Flybuys is evolving far beyond pointsâ€”using advanced analytics to deliver hyper-personalized offers, reimagining routine shopping into magical moments, and helping Australians maximize value in their everyday lives across a vast network of retail partners like Coles, Wesfarmers, Kmart, and Bunnings. Anna shares candid insights into the journey of digitizing member engagement, uplifting data and communications platforms, and building a customer-first culture through technology, people empowerment, and agile collaboration.
Visit Flybuys: experience.flybuys.com.au
Hear firsthand how personalized data, technology, and member-centric design are putting Flybuys at the heart of millions of Australiansâ€™ daily lives.
Learn more about AWS Retail solutions: http://go.aws/4objzDU
#AWS #Retail #AI #DigitalTransformation #AmazonWebServices #CloudComputing

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]When it comes to muscles: Use them before you lose them #HowToBeABetterHuman #TEDTalks

ns2:group.ns2:title: When it comes to muscles: Use them before you lose them #HowToBeABetterHuman #TEDTalks
ns2:group.ns2:description: Did you know that you start losing muscle mass as soon as the age of 30? Author and surfer Bonnie Tsui explores how to build strength as you age with Chris Duffy, host of the "How to Be a Better Human" podcast. Watch as Bonnie tries to teach Chris how to surf while weaving in lessons on the benefits of weightlifting, maintaining mobility and adding more movement into your life.

ns2:group.ns2:description:
You can now customize how you see shared projects without affecting your teammates. Filter for your tasks, change layouts, adjust grouping â€“ your view stays yours.
In this video, Denise from the Product Marketing team shows you how view customization works in shared projects, including how to reset to the default view and set a standard view for your whole team.
Helpful Timestamps: 00:00 Intro 00:09 Customize your view of a shared project 01:20 Reset to the projectâ€™s default view 01:33 Change the default view of a shared project 02:05 Outro

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]AWS Innovation with Inovalon | Innovation Ambassadors | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: AWS Innovation with Inovalon | Innovation Ambassadors | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Explore the intersection of healthcare and AI with Inovalon and AWS. Our host Sara welcomes Dr. Paige Kilian (CMO, Inovalon), Kate Marta (VP, Clinical Quality & Innovation), Rachel Stemerman (Principal TPM), Allison Pryor (Sr. Prototyping Engineer, AWS), and Mohammad Salehan (Prototyping Engineer, AWS) as they discuss transforming healthcare through AI-powered medical record review.
Learn how Inovalon processes millions of medical records annually using LLMs and AWS services while maintaining regulatory compliance and human oversight. The conversation covers their journey from prototype to production, implementing solutions for risk adjustment and quality reporting, while tackling challenges like analyzing thousands of pages of medical documentation with consistent accuracy.
Discover how they've integrated advanced text processing, evidence highlighting, and human validation to create scalable solutions that improve healthcare delivery through better data analysis.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]The Best Thing That Could Happen to the Energy Industry | Matt Tilleard | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: The Best Thing That Could Happen to the Energy Industry | Matt Tilleard | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
History has been written by whoever controls the dominant fuel of the era â€” until now, says renewables entrepreneur Matt Tilleard. He explains why, as the clean energy transition ramps up, weâ€™re moving from a world where energy comes from burning fuels to one where it will come from using technology. Learn why this could change everything about global power dynamics â€” and why the future belongs not to those who control resources, but to those who build and share technology. (Recorded at TED Countdown Summit 2025 on June 16, 2025)

ns2:group.ns2:title: An Apple Shortcuts masterclass | Vergecast
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Metaâ€™s smart glasses have been a hit in part because they donâ€™t try to do too much. With the new Display glasses, though, Meta is trying to do... a lot more. The Vergeâ€™s Victoria Song joins the show to tell us about her experience with the glasses, from the impressive but very first-gen hardware to the somewhat underwhelming set of things you can do. After that, podcaster and creator Stephen Robles explains to David why heâ€™s dead wrong about Apple Shortcuts. Stephen shares how he uses Shortcuts, why heâ€™s found such a big audience of Shortcuts fans on YouTube and elsewhere, and why itâ€™s worth doing the work to learn Appleâ€™s most powerful app. Finally, David answers a question from the Vergecast Hotline (call 866-VERGE11 or email vergecast@theverge.com!) about which wireless earbuds you should buy â€” and why it might be the pair you already own.
00:00 Intro 03:05 Discussion on Smart Glasses Usability 21:13 Privacy Concerns and Ethical Implications 36:23 Apple Shortcuts Debate 42:18 Enhancing Screenshots with iPhone Frames 43:17 Creating and Sharing Shortcuts 43:44 Automating Daily Tasks with Shortcuts 45:47 Advanced Shortcuts and Apple Intelligence 49:07 Building Custom Shortcuts for Unique Needs 58:06 The Future of Shortcuts and AI Integration 01:00:05 Practical Uses and Community Requests 01:06:22 Challenges and Improvements in Shortcuts 01:14:36 Vergecast Hotline

ns2:group.ns2:title: The Next Apple TV Is Comingâ€¦ Hereâ€™s What to Expect
ns2:group.ns2:description:
A new Apple TV 4K is expected to launch toward the end of 2025, and itâ€™s shaping up to be the biggest update in years. From a potential A17 Pro and N1 chip with Wi-Fi 7 support to Apple Intelligence features and even a rumored built-in camera for FaceTime, this might finally be the Apple TV upgrade weâ€™ve been waiting for.
In this video, I break down everything we know so far â€” including whatâ€™s new in tvOS 26, the new Liquid Glass design, better FaceTime experiences, and whether Apple can actually hit that rumored sub-$100 price point.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Securing Agentic Workflows Using AWS and Coalfire | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Securing Agentic Workflows Using AWS and Coalfire | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Join Nate Dehmuth (Vice President of AI and Services at Coalfire) and Saptarshi Banerjee (AWS Senior Solutions Architect) to explore building secure, autonomous AI agents with reliable security and privacy controls. Through a real-world case study of support ticket processing agents, this session addresses key challenges including inconsistent processing, inappropriate tool usage, and security violations like PII exposure. Learn how Coalfire's Secure Agent Construct maps to AWS services to implement proper isolation, permissions, and feedback loops. Discover repeatable design patterns that ensure autonomous agents operate safely within enterprise expectations while delivering reliable outcomes. Perfect for architects, developers, and security professionals seeking to deploy secure AI agents using AWS primitives and Coalfire's proven methodologies

ns2:group.ns2:description:
Join Saptarshi Banerjee (AWS Senior Solutions Architect) and Joe Marta (Coalfire Product Director for Applied AI) to discover how enterprises can leverage Audit AI to build production-ready generative AI applications. This session addresses key enterprise challenges including quality, scale, and control through Coalfire's advanced document processing, scalable architecture, and prompt flows as code. Learn how Audit AI delivers speed and accuracy gains while enabling robust, enterprise-ready AI applications that drive meaningful business outcomes. Attendees will explore Audit AI's key features and capabilities for building production-ready generative AI solutions. ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Enhancing Compliance with Coalfire's Compliance Essentials Platform | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Enhancing Compliance with Coalfire's Compliance Essentials Platform | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Join Joe Marta (Coalfire Product Director) and Saptarshi Banerjee (AWS) to learn how to build robust compliance architecture using AWS services and Coalfire's Compliance Essentials Platform. This session covers a "Defense in Depth" strategy including edge security with CloudFront/WAF, network isolation via VPC/PrivateLink, access control through IAM/SSO, and high availability with multi-AZ deployments and EKS auto-scaling. Discover how to maintain continuous compliance monitoring using CloudWatch, MetricStream, and New Relic, while leveraging Coalfire's platform to centralize compliance work across 85+ frameworks. Perfect for architects, developers, and security professionals seeking practical strategies to enhance their AWS-based compliance solutions through effective perimeter security, data isolation, access control, and continuous monitoring.
Learn more at: http://go.aws/47hRqUQ

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]The key to life? Recognize and use the freedom you already have. #TEDTalks

ns2:group.ns2:title: The key to life? Recognize and use the freedom you already have. #TEDTalks
ns2:group.ns2:description: The real lever of a meaningful life isnâ€™t intelligence or hustle â€” itâ€™s personal agency, says Cate Hall, former Supreme Court attorney and once the worldâ€™s top-ranked female poker player. Sharing her journey from the throes of addiction to leading a multibillion-dollar foundation, Hall shares tactical wisdom for increasing your ability to see and act on life's hidden degrees of freedom, showing how even the most trapped among us can discover a path to fulfillment.

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Amazon Web Services]Retail loyalty reinvented by Flybuys | Retail Insights with AWS | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Retail loyalty reinvented by Flybuys | Retail Insights with AWS | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Join us for a captivating conversation with Anna Lee, CEO of Flybuys, Australiaâ€™s leading coalition loyalty program, as we uncover how Flybuys is revolutionizing customer experience through data-driven innovation and personalized engagement. In this episode, hosts Lucy Moffat (Head of Cross Industry, ANZ) and Isha Dalal (Enterprise Solutions Architect) take you behind the scenes of Flybuysâ€™ journey, showcasing how everyday shopping is being transformed into truly rewarding experiences for millions across Australia. Discover how Flybuys has grown from a classic loyalty program to a vibrant part of daily life, creating moments of delight and connecting people to their favourite retail partners.
Discover how Flybuys is evolving far beyond pointsâ€”using advanced analytics to deliver hyper-personalized offers, reimagining routine shopping into magical moments, and helping Australians maximize value in their everyday lives across a vast network of retail partners like Coles, Wesfarmers, Kmart, and Bunnings. Anna shares candid insights into the journey of digitizing member engagement, uplifting data and communications platforms, and building a customer-first culture through technology, people empowerment, and agile collaboration.
Visit Flybuys: experience.flybuys.com.au
Hear firsthand how personalized data, technology, and member-centric design are putting Flybuys at the heart of millions of Australiansâ€™ daily lives.
Learn more about AWS Retail solutions: http://go.aws/4objzDU

ns2:group.ns2:title: Build beautiful frontends with OpenAI Codex
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Codexâ€™s multimodal abilities can help you design, iterate, and build beautiful frontends for your apps.
Channing Conger and Romain Huet show you how to use Codex cloud as your front-end design partner to build the perfect UI for your app.
Timestamps:
00:00 Intro 00:50 Whiteboarding design ideas 01:43 Creating Codex tasks from your phone 02:16 Sketching a new feature 03:00 Different ways to use multimodal features 04:06 Channingâ€™s favorite examples 05:36 Checking in on our tasks 07:30 What Channing and team are building next
Try it yourself:
Codex cloud: chatgpt.com/codex
Learn more: Codex: openai.com/codex Developer docs: https://developers.openai.com/codex/cloud

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Ellie Golden Life]therapy dogs surprise marathon runners
[Amazon Web Services]Lionâ€™s AI strategy in B2B commerce | Retail Insights with AWS | Amazon Web Services

ns2:group.ns2:title: Lionâ€™s AI strategy in B2B commerce | Retail Insights with AWS | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Join us for an insightful conversation with Robb Simpson, Group Digital & Data Director at Lion, one of Australasia's most iconic beverage companies, as we explore how a century-old brewery is leading the charge in B2B digital transformation and data commercialization.
Watch full episode here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gGfFy1IccwI&list=PLhr1KZpdzukevIWxQPbYmL9XWyBgj9xbz
In this episode, hosts Isha Dalal (Enterprise Solutions Architect at AWS) and Andrew Bremner (Head of Retail, Travel & Hospitality) dive deep into the rapidly evolving B2B commerce landscape, where digital sales have surged from just 13% in 2019 to 80% today, with the global market racing toward $48 trillion by 2030. Discover how Lion is transforming from a traditional beverage manufacturer into a data-driven powerhouse that creates value for retailers, distributors, and venues across Australia, New Zealand, and the US.
Robb shares valuable insights on AI Strategy, commercializing data to unlock new revenue streams, implementing customer-centric design in B2B environments, and bridging the gap between technology teams and market realities. Explore how Lion's approach to data commercialization is turning every transaction into actionable intelligence, creating win-win partnerships that go far beyond traditional supplier-retailer relationships. From their portfolio of beloved brands like Tooheys, XXXX, James Squire, and Steinlager to their cutting-edge B2B digital platforms, see how Lion is setting new standards for what's possible in beverage industry innovation.
Whether you're a retailer looking to enhance B2B partnerships, a technology leader interested in data commercialization strategies, or a business professional exploring digital transformation in traditional industries, this episode offers valuable insights into the future of B2B commerce and customer-centric innovation.
Visit Lion: https://www.lionco.com/ Learn more about AWS Retail solutions: http://go.aws/4objzDU

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [TED]How to Use Your Muscles â€” or Risk Losing Them (W/ Bonnie Tsui) | How to Be a Better Human | TED

ns2:group.ns2:title: How to Use Your Muscles â€” or Risk Losing Them (W/ Bonnie Tsui) | How to Be a Better Human | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Did you know that you start losing muscle mass as soon as the age of 30? Author and surfer Bonnie Tsui explores how to build strength as you age with Chris Duffy, host of the "How to Be a Better Human" podcast. Watch as Bonnie tries to teach Chris how to surf while weaving in lessons on the benefits of weightlifting, maintaining mobility and adding more movement into your life.
This episode is part of the How to Be a Better Human Bonus Videos series. You can find the extended interview on the TED Audio Collective YouTube Channel.
Follow Host: Chris Duffy (Instagram: @chrisiduffy | https://chrisduffycomedy.com/) Guest: Bonnie Tsui (Instagram: @bonnietsui8 | https://www.bonnietsui.com/)

ns2:group.ns2:title: AWS + Intel Xeon6: Fastest Intel-Powered EC2 Yet | Amazon Web Services
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Power your workloads with AWS's new 8th generation EC2 instances, featuring custom Intel Xeon 6 processors - exclusively on AWS! The complete family of C8i, M8i, and R8i instances, along with their flexible counterparts (C8i-Flex, M8i-Flex, R8i-Flex), are now available.
Choose the perfect instance for your workload: C8i: Ideal for compute-intensive applications M8i: Perfect for large in-memory databases R8i: Optimized for memory-intensive workloads
Plus, flex variants give you more control over your resources, letting you customize your deployment to match your exact needs. Only on AWS!

ns0:entry.ns0:title: [Commonwealth Realm]Zelda 40th Anniversary Revealing New Zelda Horror?

ns2:group.ns2:title: Zelda 40th Anniversary Revealing New Zelda Horror?
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Zelda has been famous for its darker horror elements since Ocarina of Time. So will the Zelda 40th Anniversary reveal proper Zelda Darkness and Horror both in a remake and the next game?
#nintendoswitch2 #zelda #ocarinaoftime
Timestamps: 00:00 - New Zelda Horror for Zelda 40th? 02:00 - Tears of the Kingdom was dark, but not Ocarina level. 04:00 - Majora's Mask after Ocarina Remake? 06:00 - Next Zelda Game with Darker themes 08:00 - Why The Depths missed the mark

ns2:group.ns2:title: Going Viral Taught Me the Internet Is Broken â€” but Fixable | Deja Foxx | TED
ns2:group.ns2:description:
Digital strategist Deja Foxx went viral for speaking up at a town meeting â€” and then learned the harsh cost of being in social mediaâ€™s crosshairs. She welcomes us to the â€œgirl internet,â€ a growing ecosystem of women-led platforms that prioritize privacy, community and respect. "Weâ€™re building a new, better way of being online, no matter your generation or your gender," she says. (Recorded at TED2025 on April 10, 2025)
